venue.address_2: 1 Mile West of the Hairpin Turn
venue.name: Greeley Ponds Trailhead

item.description:
This is your opportunity to bag two peaks in one day. Enjoy the serenity of the lovely pond and the challenge of steep, peak climbing. This is for experienced hikers only. (7.6 miles round trip, 3116 feet ofelevation gain) (Mt. Osceola 4340' : East Osceola 4156'). This is a full day of hiking.
Level Four Hike. You must have the required gear to attend this trip (listed in the "about" section). Please remember to bring lunch, snacks, plenty of water and a change of clothes.

Optional camping on Saturday night with a shorter hike on Sunday. If you need camping gear, please let me or Alex know.

If you're ready for a challenge, this is a good place to start.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at trail head (after the xc skiing parking area)
item.name: Osceola and East Osceola Summit Hike and Camping
